line.hiragana: Moon Pride
line.english: Moon Pride

line.hiragana: あなた|の|ちから|に|なりたい
line.kanji: あなた|の|力|に|なりたい
line.english: I want to become your strength
line.explained: you|r (indicates posession)|strength/power|points to your strength|want to become (naru = become, -tai is a suffix which means 'to want to')
line.builder: *you*|you*r*|your *strength*|your strength|*I want to become* your strength

line.hiragana: なみだ|は|ほほ|を|つたい
line.english: Tears run down cheeks
line.explained: tears|points to tears|cheek|points to tears and cheeks|to go along/ to follow, meaning to run down cheeks

line.hiragana: ひとみ|は|あかく|もえる
line.english: Eyes burn red
line.explained: eye|points to eye|represents red and white|to burn

line.hiragana: いなずま|の|よう|に|はげしく
line.english: such as an intense lightning strike
line.explained: lightning|← (indicates something possessed by the lightning)|likewise/similar|points to the lightning to then say what feature of the lightning it is similar to the eyes burning red|violent/intense

line.hiragana: だれか|が|あい|を|さけぶ
line.english: Someone's shouting out love
line.explained: someone|points to someone|love|marks someone and love to then say what that someone is doing with love|shout

line.hiragana: たとえ|どんな|くらやみ|でも
line.english: even if you're in a dark place

line.hiragana: ひとり|じゃ|ない|よ|ね
line.english: You're not alone, you know

line.hiragana: わたしたち|を|てらす|moonlight
line.english: we are illuminated by the moonlight

line.romaji: Onnanoko ni mo yuzurenu kyouji ga aru
line.hiragana: おんなのこ|に|も|ゆずれぬ|きょうじ|が|ある
line.kanji: 嗚呼女の子|に|も|譲れぬ|矜持|が|ある
line.english: Even girls have a sense of pride they can't give up

line.romaji: sore wa oujisama ni unmei nagezu mizukara tatakau ishi
line.hiragana: それ|は|おうじさま|に|うんめい|なげず|みずから|たたかう|いし
line.kanji: それ|は|王子様|に|運命|投げず|自ら|戦う|意志
line.english: don't leave your fate to the prince, fight with your own strength

line.romaji: shiny make up kagayaku yo hoshizora wo atsumete
line.hiragana: shiny|make|up|かがやく|よ|ほしぞら|を|あつめて
line.english: Shiny make up, we'll shine together under the stars

line.romaji: tada mamorareru dake no kayowai sonzai ja nai wa
line.hiragana: ただ|まもられる|だけ|の|かよわい|そんざい|じゃ|ない|わ
line.kanji: ただ|護られる|だけ|の|か弱い|存在|じゃ|ない|わ
line.english: We're not frail girls who need to be protected

line.hiragana: かなしみ|の|なみ|に|ゆられ
line.english: Swayed by the wave of sadness

line.romaji: ikari no hi ni yakarete mo
line.hiragana: いかり|の|ひ|に|やかれて|も
line.kanji: 怒り|の|焔(ひ)|に|灼かれて|も
line.english: burnt by the flames of anger

line.hiragana: いなずま|の|よう|に|まばゆく
line.english: as dazzling as lightning

line.hiragana: とわ|の|あい|を|ちかう
line.english: I swear on the eternity of love

line.hiragana: たとえ|いま|は|はなれてて|も
line.english: Even if, right now we're far apart

line.hiragana: ひとり|じゃ|ない|よ|ね
line.english: You're not alone, you know

line.hiragana: わたしたち|を|つなぐ|moonlight
line.english: We're connected by the moonlight

line.romaji: onnanoko ni wa muteki no buki ga aru
line.hiragana: おんなのこ|に|は|むてき|の|ぶき|が|ある
line.kanji: 嗚呼女の子|に|は|無敵|の|武器|が|ある
line.english: All girls have an unbeatable weapon

line.romaji: sore wa yowasa ni yorisou manazashi to subete ukeireru tsuyo sa
line.hiragana: それ|は|よわさ|に|よりそう|まなざし|と|すべて|うけいれる|つよ|さ
line.kanji: それ|は|弱さ|に|寄り添う|眼差し|と|全て|受け入れる|強|さ
line.english: It's the strength to accept your weakness and overcome it

line.romaji: shiny make up kirameku yo hoshizora ni idakarete
line.hiragana: shiny|make|up|きらめく|よ|ほしぞら|に|いだかれて
line.kanji: Shiny|Make|Up|煌めく|よ|星空|に|抱かれて
line.english: Shiny make up, we'll shine together under the starry sky

line.romaji: toki wo koeta kizuna ga watashi ni yuuki wo kureru
line.hiragana: とき|を|こえた|きずな|が|わたし|に|ゆうき|を|くれる
line.kanji: 時|を|超えた|絆|が|私|に|勇気|を|くれる
line.english: Our bond that crosses time and space gives us strength

line.hiragana: こいしくて|せつなくて|なきたく|なる|よ
line.kanji: 恋しくて|切なくて|泣きたく|なる|よ
line.english: This love is so painful, it makes me cry

line.romaji: aitakute samishikute kake dashi sonna haato
line.hiragana: あいたくて|さみしくて|かけ|だし|そんな|はーと
line.kanji: 会いたくて|淋しくて|駈け出し|そうな|恋心
line.english: My heart is lonely and wants to meet you

line.romaji: kono hiroi uchuu de nando umarekawattemo
line.hiragana: この|ひろい|うちゅう|で|なんど|うまれかわっても
line.kanji: この|広い|宇宙|で|何度|生まれ変わっても
line.english: No matter the amount of times I'm reborn in this vast universe

line.hiragana: あなた|に|こい|を|する
line.english: I'll fall in love with you

line.romaji: shiny make up habataku yo hoshizora no kanata e
line.hiragana: shiny|make|up|はばたく|よ|ほしぞら|の|かなた|へ
line.kanji: Shiny|Make|Up|羽ばたく|よ|星空|の|彼方|へ
line.english: Shiny make up, we'll fly beyond the starry sky

line.romaji: tsumi ga mawaru sekai demo mirai wo shinjirareru
line.hiragana: つみ|が|まわる|せかい|でも|みらい|を|しんじられる
line.kanji: 罪|が|廻る|世界|でも|未来|を|信じられる
line.english: Sins may make the world go round buy I'll believe in the future

line.romaji: dakara shiny make up tatakau yo hoshizora wo matotte
line.hiragana: だから|shiny|make|up|たたかう|よ|ほしぞら|を|まとって
line.kanji: だから|Shiny|Make|Up|戦う|よ|星空|を|纏って
line.english: So shiny make up, we'll fight amongst the stars

line.romaji: atarashii densetsu ga ima koko kara hajimaru
line.hiragana: あたらしい|でんせつ|が|いま|ここ|から|はじまる
line.kanji: 新しい|伝説|が|今|ここ|から|始まる
line.english: A new legend begins from now

line.romaji: La la pretty guardian sailor moon
line.hiragana: La|la|pretty|guardian|sailor|moon
line.english: La la pretty guardian sailor moon
line.builder: La| La| Pretty| Gurdian| SAILOR| MOON
